summary: This Mod adds a cute female companion who will accompany you on your epic adventures!
descriptionHtml:
frst of all i know this is not lore friendly in anyway xD but i got a few request to post her on the nexus so i did.

This Mod adds a cute female companion who will accompany you on your epic adventures!
she can be found at THE BANNERED MARE.


-IMPORTANT-
you will need the following mods!!!

-ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
-Flans Eyes for Skyrim by DarNilavu
-Pretty girl like SuzumiyaHaruhi CV Aya with an underwear by FrankSunday(DON\\\'T FORGET TO INSTALL THE FIX!)

-Highly Recommended!-
UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul
Followers can Relax
Extensible Follower Framework

-HAVING TROUBLE RECRUITING HER?-
While in game click on ferris and type bat ferris
author: xxomegafactorxx
